application.doc: Updating an existing DynURL configuration file

method.name: PUT
method.id: Updating an existing DynURL configuration file
method.doc: To update an existing DynURL configuration file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the DynURL Configuration File resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: dynurl_config_data
param.doc: The data that is saved into the existing DynURL configuration file. Use this to pass the new file contents as JSON.

param.name: dynurl_config_file
param.doc: The file that contains the new data to be passed into the existing DynURL configuration file. Use this to pass the new file contents as a file.

response.doc: For the changes to take effect, they must be deployed as described in Configuration changes commit process.
There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
